[How to play & how to operate]
â‘  Tilt the analog stick left and right on the title screen to change the difficulty level (choose from 3 levels: EASY, NOMAL, HARD).
â‘¡ Press any button (A, B, X, Y) to start the game.
â‘¢ Avoid obstacles (cubes) and aim for a high score.
â‘£ If your head hits the cube, the score will be displayed and you will return to the first title screen.
â‘¤ Press and hold the trigger button for 2 seconds to end the application.

[Play Tips & Specifications]
ãƒ»Because only the head has collision detection, even if the limbs or body hits an obstacle, it will not be counted. Therefore, only avoid obstacles near the face.
ãƒ»The speed of obstacles (cubes) is always constant and randomly generated.
ãƒ»Since the controller is not displayed in the game, it is recommended to hold it at all times or place it in an easy-to-find position.
ãƒ»Each time the difficulty level rises, the speed of the cubes doubles.
